title: National Theatre
description: Monumental terraces and layered forms overlooking the Thames; a masterpiece of public architecture.

body.raw:
## Architectural notes

Lasdunâ€™s composition of terraces creates public stages and framed views along the South Bank, with carefully board-marked concrete.
